original_title: Arpico Insurance CEO Dr. Kelum Senanayake appointed as Executive Director
original_body_lines: Dr. Kelum Senanayake, Chief Executive Officer and Principal Officer of Arpico Insurance PLC has been appointed as an Executive, Non-Independent Director of the Company, following the endorsement from the Insurance Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka.

Dr. Senanayake took reigns at Arpico Insurance PLC as its CEO in March, 2021 and has over 40 years of experience in the insurance industry. He also has the privilege of being the first and only CEO in the Sri Lankan Insurance industry to hold the coveted Million Dollar Round Table (MDRT) status, achieved in Sri Lanka in an impressive 133 days. In addition to being the Executive Director / Chief Executive Officer / Principal Officer of Arpico Insurance PLC, he also serves on the Boards of Richard Peiris Distributors and Richard Peiris Finance Company as a Director.

He began his career in 1982 at Mercantile Credit Ltd, the principal agent for National Insurance Corporation and moved to Union Assurance PLC where he rose to the rank of Assistant General Manager during a career spanning over 27 years with the company. Thereafter, subsequently he joined AIA Insurance Lanka as General Manager – Operations, where he rose to the rank of Director – Operations, during a stint spanning over a decade.

Ramal Jasinghe – Chairman, Arpico Insurance PLC, said: ‘It is truly a privilege to have our CEO Dr. Kelum appointed to the Board as an Executive Director. His contributions to the company and industry are commendable and the strategic foresight he offers will be decisive in steering the company to reach great heights.’’
